page.title: 17HOBBIES OF R.PADLEY(11)
page.content: One of my favourite hobbies is model making.With my pocket money I buy kits which are scale replicas of military vehicles.These I make up and design and make scale scenes for the models with my dad. Another hobby is collecting Post Office 1st.Day Covers.My grandad sends these to me every time new stamps come out. I also like drawing .I play football for the school. Since dad gave me his old camera I have started to take pictures and am starting a collection of car pictures. I got some good ones in France when I went on holiday. I also have a computer which I play games on.
